thread.section_title: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A very welcoming place
thread.title_full: A very welcoming place - Review of Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: drandall2008
title: A very welcoming place
text: This is a cinema- themed hotel, appealing to me from my 'nouvelle vague' watching days. More importantly, the rooms were comfortable, the staff were lovely and there were many small touches that made the hotel feel very welcoming, such as a free soft drinks mini-bar, and free coffee and cakes in the afternoon. The hotel is also very convenient for the Metro and walking distance to the Beaubourg and Les Halles. Altogether, a very nice experience.
